Vladimir Putin awarded Segal Russian citizenship in 2016. The actor is a fan of the president and even once called him "one of the greatest world leaders."On Good Morning Britain, Seagal was asked about the Justice Department's investigation into Russia's meddling in the presidential election and possible collusion by Trump's associates. Putin has denied such allegations."Every country is involved in espionage. Every single country. The American...
title: Steven Seagal, Is That You? Twitter Roasts Actor After Live Interview From Russia
